definition: to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]
to hope for/to long for/to expect

sentences.english: You should send a message to your family, maybe they are looking forward to it!
sentences.chinese: 給您的家人報一聲平安，或許他們正在翹首企盼。

sentences.english: Several thousand supporters strained to catch a glimpse of the new president.
sentences.chinese: 幾千名支持者翹首企盼能一睹新總統的風采。

sentences.english: I went from being on the fence about a sixth season to kind of hoping that there’ll be a seventh.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛還在觀望第六季的我已經開始翹首企盼第七季了。

sentences.english: Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month.
sentences.chinese: 幾部讓人翹首企盼的錄像片終於將在這個月到貨。

sentences.english: Stephanie dreams of an Amelia-type marriage day and night.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬尼夙夜企盼着一段鸞鳳和鳴的姻緣。

sentences.english: Time goes by quickly, we were waiting for today for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 時間飛逝，我們已翹首企盼今天這個日子好久了。

sentences.english: I want to be friends with you, but I can't tell you my company name now.
sentences.chinese: 我企盼豐城能走向繁榮富強，因爲我是豐城人。

definition: hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to hope/to wish/hope/wish/(old) name of an official post
to hope for/to look forward to
to seek for/to hope to gain/desirous
to long for/to look forward to/longing/vision for the future
to raise one's head and look
